title: Salted caramel and coffee éclairs
description: These grown-up éclairs are very straightforward and will have you wowing family and friends.Equipment and preparation: you will need a piping bag fitted with a 1cm/½in plain nozzle.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz unsalted butter, cut into roughly 1cm/½in pieces
3 tbsp cold strong coffee (espresso is ideal)
